Package ohos.agp.animation

Interface Animator.StateChangedListener

  • Enclosing class:
    Animator

    public static interface Animator.StateChangedListener
    Listens for animator state changes.

    This class allows a notification to be received when an animator is paused or resumed.

    Since:
    3

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void onCancel​(Animator animator)
      Receives a notification indicating that an animator has been canceled.
      void onEnd​(Animator animator)
      Receives a notification indicating that an animator has ended.
      void onPause​(Animator animator)
      Receives a notification indicating that an animator is paused.
      void onResume​(Animator animator)
      Receives a notification indicating that an animator is resumed.
      void onStart​(Animator animator)
      Receives a notification indicating that an animator has started.
      void onStop​(Animator animator)
      Receives a notification indicating that an animator has stopped.

    • Method Detail

      • onStart

        void onStart​(Animator animator)
        Receives a notification indicating that an animator has started.
        Parameters:
        animator - Indicates the started animator.
        See Also:
        Animator.start()

      • onStop

        void onStop​(Animator animator)
        Receives a notification indicating that an animator has stopped. This method must be called before the onEnd and onCancel methods.
        Parameters:
        animator - Indicates the stopped animator.
        See Also:
        Animator.stop()

      • onCancel

        void onCancel​(Animator animator)
        Receives a notification indicating that an animator has been canceled.
        Parameters:
        animator - Indicates the canceled animator.
        See Also:
        Animator.cancel()

      • onEnd

        void onEnd​(Animator animator)
        Receives a notification indicating that an animator has ended.
        Parameters:
        animator - Indicates the ended animator.
        See Also:
        Animator.end()

      • onPause

        void onPause​(Animator animator)
        Receives a notification indicating that an animator is paused.
        Parameters:
        animator - Indicates the paused animator.
        See Also:
        Animator.pause()

      • onResume

        void onResume​(Animator animator)
        Receives a notification indicating that an animator is resumed.
        Parameters:
        animator - Indicates the resumed animator.
        See Also:
        Animator.resume()
